Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement ProgressManager pattern for CollectionManagerSync

Updated to follow ProgressManager''s hybrid sync pattern:
1. Bulk load all documents first via remote.getCollection()
2. Stream individual document updates and deletions

Changes:
- Updated RemoteCollectionService protocol: replaced streamCollection() with streamCollectionUpdates() that returns (updates, deletions) tuple
- Updated CollectionManagerSync to handle individual document updates/deletions instead of re-fetching entire collection
- Updated MockRemoteCollectionService to match new protocol
- Added bulkLoadStart/Success/Fail events
- Updates stream yields individual documents (added/modified)
- Deletions stream yields document IDs (removed)

This prevents unnecessary full collection fetches and improves performance.
